title: A Conversation with Alan Rickman (Part 2)
description: Neil deGrasse Tyson’s interview with Alan Rickman concludes with a discussion of “the mysterious mechanism of acting and theatre and storytelling” and the use of special effects in the Harry Potter movies.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
